name: ComponentReference

contact.name: Visit the Github repository for more information

description: A reference to a CTS2 model element. ComponentReference may reference a model attribute, a Property or a special element such as match strength.

element.definition: A reference to a CTS2 model element. ComponentReference may reference a model attribute, a Property or a special element such as match strength.

element.name: attributeReference
element.short: a reference to an attribute in a CTS2 model such as formalName, designation, etc
element.definition: a reference to an attribute in a CTS2 model such as formalName, designation, etc.

element.name: propertyReference
element.short: a reference to a model Property
element.definition: a reference to a model Property. The reference target carries the URI and, optionally, namespace and name of the property predicate.

element.name: specialReference
element.short: the target of the reference is a special element such as the match strength of a search
element.definition: the target of the reference is a special element such as the match strength of a search
